ygData.subject: Re: Reminder - eqbards irc chat
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Gah, Toren - check the time on the invite, and the time it was sent....  According to my email, at least, your invite is 2 or 3 hours too late.... Methinks
ygData.messageBody:
At 12:32 AM 11/25/99 +0000, you wrote:
>From: eqbards-owner@onelist.com
>
>We would like to remind you of this upcoming event.
>
>eqbards irc chat
>
>Date: Wednesday, November 24, 1999
>Time: 08:00PM - 10:00PM EST (GMT-05:00)
>
>A moderated chat for the members of eqbards. If all goes well
>the chat will be open discussion.
>server: irc.stratics.com
>room: #eqbards
>
>Any questions or problems just email chat@...


Gah, Toren - check the time on the invite, and the time it was
sent.... According to my email, at least, your invite is 2 or 3 hours too
late....
Methinks the calender function of Onelist is not very effective.


Talies the Wanderer
Check out the EverQuesting Bard:
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
